                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'user\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<com.toptal.entrance.alexeyz.domain.Jog>> list(@RequestParam(value="from",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd")

                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'admin\')")

        GET /rest/jog/listall?from=2015-01-01&to=2016-02-01
